divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on the roof of the hotel that I work in...the ball was droping in times square and I was on the roof to celebrate.. as soon as the new year happened I could hear the cheers from times bc I work close by...directly above times square three objects appeared then they made a triangle formation and flew away at great speed...approximately 3 mins later about 10 lights appeared in the sky to my right then disappeared ...approximately 1 min later approximately 20 objects zipped through the sky directly above me...this was a complete life altering event I'm sure other people witnessed this event...this was a very big showing please feel free to contact me.
Summary: not glowing but light in color
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around December 31st 2010
